messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: After a long time i have now self promoted myself to acting captain

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: A snake has died in my office, we shall now have a minute of silence and everyone who talks within 5 minutes are to be executed

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: who let darell touch the DJ controls again

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: enjoy some of this music we researched that the pannel said would make your productivity go up by 10%

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
